titles.title: To provide that individuals who exhaust their rights to disaster unemployment benefits shall be entitled to emergency unemployment benefits.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H698-699)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

bill.summary: 2/18/1993--Introduced. Amends the Emergency Unemployment Compensation Act of 1991 to entitle to emergency unemployment benefits, under specified conditions, individuals who exhaust their rights to disaster unemployment benefits under the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act.
